content.text: Hi!  I'm a stay-at-home cat mom looking for new ways to entertain myself and my cats.
Hi! I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time.
What kinds of things do you build?
I like to make things for my family, like furniture and decorations. I also like to cook ethnic foods and listen to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it. I've been trying to learn how to make more ethnic foods, but I haven't had much luck.
What kind of ethnic foods are you interested in learning how to make?
I'd love to learn how to make Indian food. I love the spices and flavors, but I've never been able to get them right.
Indian food is delicious! I'm sure you'd be able to make it if you followed a recipe. There are a lot of great recipes online.
I'll have to check out some recipes. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
